Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2017 06:52PM Brookie120 wrote: I am 38 and just went for my first mammogram 9/7. I was called back for more pictures after identifying a 3cm area of pleomorphic microcalcifications in my left breast. I had a biopsy Thursday and am awaiting results. No history of bc in my family
